job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a machine learning engineer with a mastery of AWS (training and deploying models, lambdas and endpoints).To succeed in this role, you should possess outstanding skills in machine learning methods and statistics.ResponsibilitiesCreate, implement, and train machine learning modelsClean and structure dataCreate and test hypothesesTrain the developed models to run evaluative experiments to refine models and increase accuracyRemain updated in the rapidly changing field of machine learningRequirementsStrong command of structured and unstructured data preparationMaster/commander of PythonMastery of AWSExperience in relational and non-relational databases (eg. dynamoDB, mySQL)Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Computational Linguistics or similar fieldAt least 2 years of experience in a non-academic production role.The ability to meet agreed upon deadlines and responsibilities.DesirableAn analytical mind with problem-solving abilitiesStrong communication skillsInterview Process:1. Google meet interview (10-15 min.)2. check your references3. take-home project (1hr)3. Google Meet interview (20-30min.)Compensation:Job Type: Full-timePay: $90,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year
